urlText: Lift at Rhodes Station not available between the concourse, platform 1 and Blaxland Road
content:
The lift between the concourse, platform 1 and Blaxland Road is temporarily out of service.
From Monday 11 September until Friday 15 September, lift upgrades will be taking place at Rhodes station. Accessible access to Rhodes station will be available from Walker Street. 

Customer’s arriving on Platform 1 that require lift assistance will need to interchange at North Strathfield station and return via Platform 2 & 3. Customers departing from Platform 1 will need to board a train from Platform 2 and interchange at Meadowbank to travel towards Strathfield/City. 


If you need help, ask staff or phone 02 9752 8467.
subtitle: Lift at Rhodes Station not available between the concourse, platform 1 and Blaxland Road

properties.smsText: Lift at Rhodes Station not available between the concourse, platform 1 and Blaxland Road
properties.speechText:
The lift at Rhodes Station between the concourse, platform 1 and Blaxland Road is temporarily out of service.
From Monday 11 September until Friday 15 September, lift upgrades will be taking place at Rhodes station. Accessible access to Rhodes station will be available from Walker Street. 

Customer’s arriving on Platform 1 that require lift assistance will need to interchange at North Strathfield station and return via Platform 2 & 3. Customers departing from Platform 1 will need to board a train from Platform 2 and interchange at Meadowbank to travel towards Strathfield/City. 


If you need help, ask staff or phone 02 9752 8467.
